Name: Golden Axe™
About the game: The land of Yuria has been invaded and is now ruled by the iron fist of Death Adder, who secured his throne by seizing the Golden Axe™. Three brave warriors now rise to the challenge of defeating Death Adder and his soldiers and returning peace to the Kingdom.
Meta Title: Golden Axe™: Jun 1, 2010, SEGA and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Golden Axe™? Check out the release date (Jun 1, 2010), developer insights from SEGA, and a complete game summary.
